title: John Bull Printing Outfit Typefaces
content:
Could anybody help me out identifying the typefaces or suggesting some similar ones to the ones found here on the John Bull Printing set:

[http://www.metaltype.co.uk/photos/images/265.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100329014332/http:/www.metaltype.co.uk/photos/images/265.jpg "http://www.metaltype.co.uk/photos/images/265.jpg")
author: louloulou

comments.content:
I think you could find something suitable here:  
 [http://www.letterheadfonts.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100329014332/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/ "http://www.letterheadfonts.com/")

Or you could search at MyFonts.com using "1800s" as the search term. Solotype, HiH and a few other foundries specialize in older 19th century styles, which this seems to be.

- Mike Yanega
